Type.Name: DirectionType
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An enumeration used by TextView and Window
Docs.remarks: This enumeration is used by and to decide how focus in the widget behaves.

Docs.summary: Tab forward through the children capable of having focus, starting at the left or top.

remarks.para: Tab forward through the children capable of having focus, starting at the left or top.

Docs.summary: Tab backward through the children with focus capability, starting at the right or bottom.

remarks.para: Tab backward through the children with focus capability, starting at the right or bottom.

Docs.summary: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the bottom of the container.

remarks.para: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the bottom of the container.

Docs.summary: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the top of the container.

remarks.para: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the top of the container.

Docs.summary: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the right edge of the container.

remarks.para: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the right edge of the container.

Docs.summary: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the left edge of the container.
Docs.remarks: Sets initial focus on the child nearest the left edge of the container.
